column4: Tesla says it sent update for security flaws found by hackers
column5: Tesla Motors Inc  said on Thursday it has sent a software patch to address security flaws in the Tesla Model S sedan that could allow hackers to take control of the vehicle.

column4: Nvidia's gaming chips drive surprise rise in revenue
column5: Nvidia Corp reported a surprise rise in second-quarter revenue and gave a better-than-expected revenue forecast for the current quarter  helped by strong demand for its graphic chips used in gaming and cars.

column4: Nvidia revenue rises 4.5 pct on strong demand for car chips
column5: Aug 6 Chipmaker Nvidia Corp reported a 4.5 percent rise in quarterly revenue  helped by strong demand for its chips used in cars and for cloud computing.

column4: UPDATE 2-Nvidia's gaming chips drive surprise rise in revenue
column5: * Shares rise more than 9 pct after-market   (Adds analyst comment  details from conference call  updates shares)

column4: Internet firms to be subject to new cybersecurity rules in EU
column5: Internet firms such as Cisco  Google  and Amazon will be subject to a new EU cybersecurity law forcing them to adopt tough security measures and possibly report serious breaches to national authorities  according to a document seen by Reuters.

column4: Internet firms to be subject to new cybersecurity rules in EU
column5: BRUSSELS Internet firms such as Cisco   Google  and Amazon  will be subject to a new EU cybersecurity law forcing them to adopt tough security measures and possibly report serious breaches to national authorities  according to a document seen by Reuters.
